text: Egha Iesus akar isɨn zuir kamɨn me geghari, “Gumazitamɨn korotiar ghurim torim an ikɨtɨma, a korotiar igiatam abigh, egh inir avɨzir kam isɨ, korotiar ghurim a dukuagh a isaman markɨ. A kamaghɨn damuva, korotiar igiar kam arɨzigham. Egh uaghan inir avɨzir igiar korotiar ghurim dukuagha isamizim, korotiar ghurimɨn mɨn ganan kogham.
